maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/195/sett.orig: Lea? Don't you remember all those guards lining up right at the entrance?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/195/sett.text: Lea ? tu te souviens pas de tout cet alignement de gardes à l'entrée ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/195/sett.orig: We better avoid running into those.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/195/sett.text: Il faudrait mieux pas tomber dessus.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/196/sett.orig: Hm? Should we cancel the sneaking?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/196/sett.text: Hm ? Est-ce qu'il faut abandonner notre incursion ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/196/sett.orig: Fine. But let's not wait too long, okay?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/196/sett.text: Bon. Mais ne trainons pas trop, OK ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/196/sett.orig: Alright, let's not give up that quickly!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/196/sett.text: Oui, il ne faut pas abandonner aussi rapidement !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/242/sett.orig: Alright... now we just have to get through there... undetected.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/242/sett.text: Bon... maintenant il faut juste qu'on passe à travers ça... sans se faire repérer.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/242/sett.orig: I'm afraid your \c[1]one-hit-kill\c[0] ability won't help us much here.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/242/sett.text: J'ai bien peur que ta capacité à rendre tout \c[1]KO en un coup\c[0] ne nous soit d'aucune aide ici.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/242/sett.orig: There's supposed to be a door up there that we can enter.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/242/sett.text: À la fin il devrait y avoir une porte où on peut entrer.
Séparons-nous, c'est plus facile de se cacher comme ça.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/242/sett.orig: Let's go separately, it's probably easier to stay hidden that way.
Huh, do you want to go ahead?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/242/sett.text: Hein, tu veux passer en premier ?
Hm... C'est pas une mauvaise idée.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/242/sett.orig: You're rather small so they'll have a hard time spotting you.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/242/sett.text: Tu es assez petite, donc ils auront plus de mal à te repérer.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/242/sett.note: de : tu passra sous le radar

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/242/sett.orig: Sneak with Lukas through the guarded area to reach \c[3]Vermillion Tower\c[0].
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/242/sett.text: Faufilez-vous avec Lukas à travers la zone surveillée pour atteindre la \c[3]Tour de Vermillion\c[0].

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/253/sett.orig: Wait... we're back at the entrance?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/253/sett.text: Attends... on est revenu à l'entrée ?
Hm... peut-être qu'on peut trouver un chemin à travers ces toits ici ?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/253/sett.orig: Hm... maybe we can find a route walking over these roofs here?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/256/sett.orig: Okay, it seems we're getting closer!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/256/sett.text: OK, on dirait qu'on se rapproche !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/258/sett.orig: Whoa... we did it, didn't we?
Okay... let's see if we can access the tower from here.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/258/sett.text: OK... voyons voir si on peut atteindre la tour d'ici.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/258/sett.orig: What a strange way to prioritize security.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/258/sett.text: C'est curieux la manière dont ils gèrent leurs priorités question sécurité.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/258/sett.orig: Well then... nothing stopping us here. Let's enter that tower!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/258/sett.text: Bon alors... si on peut y aller, faut y aller !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/258/sett.orig: Enter the tower together with Lukas.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/258/sett.text: Entrez dans la tour avec Lukas.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/261/sett.orig: I gotta be honest... I have a bad feeling about this.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/261/sett.text: Pour être honnête... J'ai un mauvais pressentiment.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/261/sett.orig: The way we managed to get past all those guards.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/261/sett.text: La manière dont on a réussi à passer à travers tous ces gardes.
Est-ce que ce serait pas un peu... prévu pour ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/261/sett.orig: Like they wanted us to get through here?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/261/sett.text: Un peu comme s'ils voulaient qu'on s'infiltre ici pour entrer dans cette tour.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/261/sett.orig: Well... it's not like we have any other option, right?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/261/sett.text: Bon... c'est pas comme s'il y avait autre chose à faire, hein ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/261/sett.orig: Alright then. Let's enter and see what happens!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/261/sett.text: Bon, alors entrons et regardons ce qui se passe !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/262/sett.orig: Alright! Let's continue from where we left off!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/262/sett.text: C'est bon ! Continuons depuis là où on s'est arrêté !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/268/sett.orig: I don't know what you hope to achieve with this...
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/268/sett.text: Je ne sais pas ce que vous essayez de faire comme ça...

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/268/sett.orig: But it is clear that your goal is to interfere with the Evotars of this area.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/268/sett.text: Mais il est clair que votre but est d'interférer avec les Évotars de la zone.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/268/sett.orig: I won't let you continue doing this as you please.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/268/sett.text: C'est bien pour ça que je ne vais pas vous laisser faire.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/268/sett.orig: Lea, I'm sure you didn't forget about one particular Evotar.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/268/sett.text: Lea, je suis sûr que tu n'as pas oublié un certain Évotar.
Son bien-être est toujours à ma merci.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/268/sett.orig: His well-being is still at my mercy.
I will give you this one last chance to reconsider your current course.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/268/sett.text: Je vais te laisser une dernière chance, pour reconsidérer tes plans.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/268/sett.orig: Lea, do not give in to his threats!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/268/sett.text: Lea, ne cède pas à ses menaces !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/268/sett.orig: The current plan is our best chance to rescue him!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/268/sett.text: Notre plan actuel reste le meilleur moyen de le sauver !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/268/sett.orig: I suppose that means I can't change your mind.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/268/sett.text: J'imagine que ça veut dire que je ne peux pas te faire changer d'avis.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/268/sett.orig: In any case, you are about to hit a brick wall!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/268/sett.text: En tout cas, tu vas bientôt être confronté à un obstacle !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/268/sett.orig: Lea don't give up!\. We're this close!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/268/sett.text: Lea, n'abandonne pas !\. On est si proche du but !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/281/sett.orig: Wait, that doesn't seem right. The \c[3]fixation failed\c[0]!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/281/sett.text: Attends, quelque chose ne va pas. La \c[3]fixation a échoué\c[0] !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/281/sett.orig: He managed to add a counter measure already?!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/281/sett.text: Il a déjà trouvé une contre-mesure ?!

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/281/sett.orig: Lea, focus on staying alive! I will work on a solution ASAP!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/281/sett.text: Lea, concentre-toi pour rester en vie ! Je cherche une solution aussi vite que possible !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/282/sett.orig: It looks like you're still at it?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/282/sett.text: On dirait que vous n'en avez pas terminé ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/282/sett.orig: Shizuka?! What are you doing here?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/282/sett.text: Shizuka ?! Qu'est-ce que tu fais ici ?
Ben, je suis là pour aider !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/282/sett.orig: Don't worry about me, I already moved locations in advance.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/282/sett.text: Ne t'inquiète pas pour moi, j'ai déjà déménagé par avance.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/282/sett.orig: More importantly, it looks like you need a hand here, Lea?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/282/sett.text: Plus important encore...\. On dirait que tu as besoin d'un coup de main, Lea ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/282/sett.orig: Let's show them what we can do!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/282/sett.text: Montrons-lui un peu ce qu'on sait faire !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/282/sett.orig: Keep them busy for a little longer, I am almost finished!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/282/sett.text: Gardez les occupés un peu plus longtemps, j'ai presque terminé !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/283/sett.orig: One of the Shredders will be marked with \c[3]yellow stars\c[0].
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/283/sett.text: Un des Découpeurs sera marqué avec des \c[3]étoiles jaunes\c[0].
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/283/sett.note: Shredders is the internal name for security brutes... yet sergey uses it.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/283/sett.orig: Defeat those and push them towards the Evotars.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/283/sett.text: Bats-le et pousse le vers les Évotars.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/283/sett.orig: They should be able to \c[3]break the blockers\c[0].
We might need several attempts though.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/283/sett.text: Il faudra peut-être plusieurs tentatives par contre.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/284/sett.orig: Hm, you found a workaround already?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/284/sett.text: Hum, tu as déjà trouvé un contournement ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/287/sett.orig: It seems like your plan didn't work out as expected, hm?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/287/sett.text: On dirait que votre plan n'a pas vraiment fonctionné, mmm ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/287/sett.orig: You have zapped every Evotar in the area.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/287/sett.text: Vous avez eu tous les Évotars de la région.
Ce n'est pas tout à fait exact.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/287/sett.orig: W-What happened? Lea... is that you?!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/287/sett.text: Q-Qu'est-ce qui s'est passé ? Lea... c'est toi ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Unexpected Error
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Erreur Inattendue

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Unexpected Error
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Erreur Inattendue

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Unexpected Error
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Erreur Inattendue

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: ...Bye.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: ... Bye.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: That was supposed to happen, right?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: C'était ce qui était censé arriver, ça, hein ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Yes! We did it!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Oui ! On a réussi !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: We crashed the Evotar server.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: On a fait planter le serveur des Évotars.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: And everything exploded?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Et tout a explosé ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Yes, but do not worry about the Evotars.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Oui, mais ne t'inquiète pas pour les Évotars.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Their data is still intact and can be recovered.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Leurs données sont intactes et on peut les récupérer.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Hm. That was your plan, I suppose?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Mmmmm. C'était ça votre plan, je suppose ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: The Evotar server has crashed, so I can't access it.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Le serveur des Évotars a planté, donc je ne peux plus y accéder.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Hah...\. clever.\. Very clever, indeed!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Hah...\. Astucieux.\. Très astucieux, vraiment !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: I assume simply rebooting the server won't fix it either, will it?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: J'imagine que redémarrer le serveur ne suffira pas pour résoudre le problème ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Hahaha!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Hahaha !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Really, I'm impressed.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Vraiment, je suis impressionné !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: To think you'd go that far, finding such an obscure loophole... just to recover some data.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: De penser que vous iriez jusqu'à trouver une vulnérabilité aussi obscure... juste pour récupérer quelques données.
"Quelques données" tu dis ?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: "Some data", you say?
You really don't hold even an ounce of respect for all the work we did over all these years, do you?!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Tu n'as toujours vraiment aucun respect pour tout le travail qu'on s'est donné depuis toutes ces années ?!

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Oh I do, Shizuka.\. I most certainly do.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Oh, si, Shizuka, j'en ai.\. J'en ai beaucoup.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: The Evotar interrogation program has been a tremendous success.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Le programme d'interrogation des Évotars a été un énorme succès.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: And it is thanks to all your efforts, I would never deny that.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Et tout cela grâce à vos efforts. Ça, je ne peux pas le nier.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Then...\. why...
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Alors...\. pourquoi...

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: WHY would you do all of this to us?!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: POURQUOI est-ce que tu nous as fait subir tout ça ?!

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Threaten us?!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Nous menacer ?!
Nous garder en otage ?!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Hold us hostage?!
Over all these years?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Pendant toutes ces années ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Because you didn't leave me any choice.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Parce que vous ne m'aviez pas laissé le choix.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: I only did what was necessary to uphold this business.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Je n'ai fait que ce qui était nécessaire pour que l'affaire puisse continuer de tourner.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: You wanted to drop everything!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Vous vouliez tout laisser tomber !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Tell the authorities.\. Make me pay for my evil deeds.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Vous vouliez me dénoncer aux autorités.\. Me faire payer pour mes crimes !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Conveniently ignoring the fact that we were all in this together.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Tout en niant naturellement que nous étions tous mouillés là-dedans.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Please don't forget that we started off as \c[3]partners\c[0].
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: N'oubliez jamais que l'on a commencé en tant que \c[3]partenaires\c[0].

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: And we'd still be partners to this day, if it wasn't for this one...\. ideological disagreement.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Et nous serions encore partenaires, si vous n'aviez pas eu ce petit... différent idéologique.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: We are creating Evotars to extract information.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Nous avons créé des Évotars pour extraire des informations.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: And once that is done, we just throw them away!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Et une fois qu'on en a fini avec eux, on s'en débarrasse !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Kill them off!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: On...\. les tues !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Evotars...\. they're not just "some data"!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Les Évotars...\. ce ne sont pas juste "quelques données" !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: They have memories.\. Personality.\. Emotions!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Ils ont des souvenirs.\. Une personnalité.\. Des émotions !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: You are killing digitized human beings, Sidwell!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Vous tuez des êtres humains numériques, Sidwell !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: What kind of monsters do you think we are to just go along with that?!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Tu crois qu'on est quel genre de monstres, pour qu'on puisse tolérer ça ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Shizuka...
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Shizuka...

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: We've had this discussion so many times already...\. I've grown tired of it.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: On a déjà eu cette discussion tant de fois...\. Ça en devient vraiment lassant.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: I've supported your research for many years now.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: J'ai soutenu vos recherches depuis plusieurs années maintenant.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: I effectively enabled you to create Evotars in the first place.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Je vous ai effectivement permis de créer des Évotars, pour commencer.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: I made it so that Evotars have a place to exist at all.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: J'ai pu permettre aux Évotars d'avoir un endroit où ils peuvent exister !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Ending this business would mark the \c[3]end of every Evotar\c[0] in existence.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Fermer boutique, ce serait signer la \c[3]fin de tous les Évotars\c[0].

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: At once and forever.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Tout de suite et pour toujours.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: I DO understand your concerns about how we abuse Evotars.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Je comprends bien vos préoccupations sur la manière dont on abuse des Évotars.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: But there are no other options.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Mais il n'y a pas autre alternative.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: How else do you think we can generate revenue, Shizuka?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Comment est-ce que tu crois qu'on peut faire du chiffre, Shizuka ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Evotars are effectively illegal.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Les Évotars sont, de fait, illégaux.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Make anything of this public and Instatainment will shut us down at once.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Rendez tout ça public, et Instatainment va tout de suite y mettre un terme.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: We can only operate in the shadow of this company, hidden in the Playground.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Tout ce qu'on peut faire, c'est opérer dans l'ombre de la compagnie, cachés à l'intérieur du Terrain de Jeu.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: The black market of information is our only option.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Le marché noir de l'information est notre seule option.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: That is a conveniently limited view if I ever heard one.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: C'est bien un point de vue très borné, ce que je viens d'entendre.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Assuming that there is simply no way to find an agreement with Instatainment.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: De présupposer qu'il n'y a aucun moyen de trouver un accord avec Instatainment.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Sure, the company will be hard to convince.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Bien sûr, la société sera difficile à convaincre.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: But you underestimate the achievements Satoshi and the others have made here.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Mais vous sous-estimez les progrès que Satoshi et les autres ont fait ici.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Those Evotars...\. they have the potential to change the world.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Ces Évotars...\. ils ont le potentiel de changer le monde.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Even Instatainment might be able to understand this.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Même Instatainment devrait être capable de comprendre ça.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: But of course, things wouldn't be quite as much under your control once Evotars become public.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Mais bien sûr, ce ne sera plus vous qui tiendrez les rênes si les Évotars deviennent publics.
Japp !\. C'est évident que vous voulez garder les choses telles qu'elles sont !
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Japp!\. Obviously, you'd like things to stay just the way they are.
Yes! Just what they said! 100% agreed!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Ouais ! Chuis d'accord à 100 % !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Fiend!\. Your deceptive speech shall not blind us!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Démon ! Tes paroles trompeuses ne nous aveugleront pas !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Oui!\. Now shut up and get down here in person!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Oui !\. Maintenant boucle là et descends ici !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: You're in for some punching!!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Tu auras droit à une tête au carré !
Inutile...\. comme d'habitude.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Pointless, as usual.
Now then...\. what next?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Sinon...\. c'est quoi la suite ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: I assume you plan to just walk up to the server, reboot it and fetch the data, am I right?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: J'imagine que votre plan est d'aller voir le serveur, de le redémarrer et de récupérer les données, j'ai pas raison ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Well, I have bad news for you.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Eh bien, j'ai une mauvaise nouvelle pour vous.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: There is a reason the server is located \c[3]inside the tower\c[0].
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: C'est qu'il y a une raison pour laquelle le serveur se trouve \c[3]à l'intérieur de la tour\c[0].

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Inside a \c[3]dungeon instance\c[0].
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Dans une \c[3]instance de donjon\c[0].

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: I hold control over the environment server.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: J'ai le contrôle sur le serveur d'environnement.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: I can clear the room instance of the server at any time.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Je peux réinitialiser l'instance de la salle du serveur à tout moment.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Effectively removing the platform below it.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Et, de fait, lui retirer la plateforme sur lequel il est.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Letting it \c[3]fall and crash\c[0]. Rendering it \c[3]unusable\c[0].
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Et le laisser \c[3]tomber et s'écraser\c[0] par terre. Pour le rendre \c[3]inutilisable\c[0].

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: No...
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Non...

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: That's right. The command to clear the data doesn't go through the Evotar server.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Et oui. La commande pour supprimer les données ne passe pas par le serveur des Évotars...

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: It goes through the \c[3]Environment Server\c[0]!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: ... Elle passe par le \c[3]Serveur d'Environnement\c[0] !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: No! How could I forget about this?!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Non ! Comment j'ai pu oublier ça ?!

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Now then!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Bon, et sinon !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: That was quite the fuss you put up there.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Vous en avez mis un beau bazar ici.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Very entertaining to watch...
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: C'était amusant à regarder...

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: But ultimately...\. all for nothing!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Mais au final...\. tout ça pour rien !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: WE BEG TO DIFFER!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: PERMETTEZ-NOUS D'EN DOUTER !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: This tower...\. it is our domain!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Cette tour...\. c'est notre domaine !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: And therefore, we will make the rules!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Et donc, c'est à nous d'en fixer les règles !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: The server will remain untouched until our final demand has been granted!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Personne ne touchera au serveur tant que notre dernière demande n'aura pas été satisfaite !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Lea!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Lea !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Once the incomplete vessel!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Autrefois, une carcasse incomplète !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Now filled with strength and determination!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Et maintenant, emplie de force et de détermination !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: We are overjoyed to have you back!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Nous sommes très heureux de vous revoir ici !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: For we have prepared the ultimate challenge!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Parce que nous vous avons préparé le défi ultime pour vous !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: The quintessential experience!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: La quintessence des frissons !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Just for you!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Juste pour vous !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: The tower is waiting to be entered!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: La tour n'attend plus que vous !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Reach the top and you shall find the server you seek!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Atteignez le dernier étage, et vous trouverez le serveur que vous êtes venue chercher !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: We are thrilled to watch your ascent!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: C'est avec joie que nous suivrons votre ascension !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Gautham...\. I can't believe this!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Gautham...\. C'est pas possible !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Now of all times!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Et maintenant en plus !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Uhm...\. what is going on?\. Anyone?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Euh...\. quelqu'un sait ce qui se passe là ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Who was that fancy-looking blue guy?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: C'était qui ce joli type bleu ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: That...\. was Gautham.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Lui...\. c'était Gautham.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Oh!\. That former colleague of yours?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Oh ! Votre ancien collègue ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Correct.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Exact.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: It seems he has taken control of the Environment Server.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: On dirait qu'il a pris le contrôle du Serveur d'Environnement.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: That is...\. good, right?
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: C'est...\. bien, non ?

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Now we might still get our chance to access the server!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Comme ça maintenant on a peut-être encore une chance de pouvoir accéder au serveur !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Yes...\. that is, if Lea takes on his challenge.\. By herself.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Oui...\. à condition que Lea relève son défi.\. Seule.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: [acquiesce]

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: One final dungeon!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Le donjon final !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Lea!\. You gotta go and show them!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Lea !\. Il faut que tu y ailles et que tu leur montres !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: That's what all our dungeon races have prepared you for!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Toutes nos courses aux donjons t'ont préparée pour ce moment !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Spheromancer Lea! I'm confident you're up to the task!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Spheromancer Lea ! Je suis convaincu que tu en es capable !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.orig: Definitely! Good luck!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/288/sett.text: Certainement ! Bonne chance !

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/302/sett.orig: Spheromancer Lea! Have you returned victoriously?!
We recovered backups for all Evotars I found on the server.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/302/sett.text: On a les sauvegardes de tous les Évotars qu'on a pu trouver sur le serveur.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/302/sett.orig: Satoshi, Lukas...\. they are all safe.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/302/sett.text: Satoshi, Lukas...\. ils sont tous sains et saufs.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/302/sett.orig: Meanwhile...\. it looks like Sidwell gave up on his business.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/302/sett.text: Et sinon...\. on dirait que Sidwell a renoncé à son business.
Il s'est déconnecté...\. et il a disparu.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/302/sett.orig: He committed suicide within the dungeon compound.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/302/sett.text: Il a mis fin à ses jours à l'intérieur du donjon.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/302/sett.orig: It happened so quickly, and there was nothing we could do to stop him.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/302/sett.text: C'était si soudain, et on ne pouvait rien faire pour l'arrêter.

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/302/sett.orig: Now of all times!\. Why would he do this now?!
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/302/sett.text: Pourquoi là ?!\. Pourquoi il fallait qu'il fasse ça maintenant ?!
... il a joué son rôle de stupide dieu...

maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/302/sett.orig: I just thought...\. he didn't care anymore...
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/302/sett.text: Je pensais juste...\. qu'il en avait plus rien à faire maintenant...

Depuis tout ce temps, je n'avais jamais pensé...\.
\.
Que c'était lui qui portait le lourd fardeau.\.
De faire les plus sales besognes de Sidwell...\.
\.
Il a dû perdre le contrôle de lui-même...\. depuis déjà bien longtemps.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/302/sett.orig:
It was one thing I never considered...\.
\.
That it was him who took on the heavy burden.\.
Handling the worst parts of Sidwell's business...\.
\.
He must have lost control...\. a long time ago.
Our long journey was about to end.
maps/arid/tower-1.json/entities/302/sett.text: ... notre long voyage touchait à sa fin.
